welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Bentonville, the charming city known for its vibrant art scene and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that our beautiful city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northwest Arkansas Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Springdale Municipal Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Springdale Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Smith Field Airport, serving all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
